meaningMnemonic: You see something that would <radical>suit</radical> you so you use your <radical>fingers</radical> and <kanji>pick up</kanji> the thing you want. You can pick up anything you think suits you. A shiny rock. A new pair of pants. Anything!
readingMnemonic: You're walking around looking for something to <kanji>pick up</kanji> when you see a sword in a rock. Yes, this will suit you. You pick up the sword and people jump out around you and tell you that you are the new <reading>hero</reading> (ひろ)! Uh oh. Maybe you shouldn't have picked this up.
